oai_dc:dc.dc:description: !nanni and Tamme belong to different groups of !kun. Tamme is one of the Yabbi and his country was the Tsaba. !nanni was a ||no and his country was the Kaku i ra. 1) This story is found in Book XI & XII-5.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bushman groups
